translation.it: Ho bruciato tutto, anche le scarpe.

translation.en: -[Cross] There's nothing left? -Nothing left. Nothing.
translation.it: - Non è rimasto nulla? - No, amico.

translation.en: -[Cross] Where are the ashes? -I threw them out on the lawn
translation.it: E dov'è la cenere? L'ho gettata nel prato

translation.en: and then I got the dirt ripped up and taken away, so…
translation.it: e poi ho fatto portare via la terra.

translation.en: [chuckles] Fuckin' well done.
[chuckles] That's gold. Fuckin' gold.
I didn't mean to do it, though. I didn't know it would happen.
translation.it: Ma non era voluto. Non l'avevo previsto.

translation.en: It's like how the words are coming out of me mouth now,
translation.it: Come ora. Le parole mi escono di bocca

translation.en: like how I'm saying it to you now, like it's nothing.
-[Cross] How far from here? -[Henry] Not far.
That's my old church there.
That's where I was married.
Don't know what I was fuckin' thinkin' of at the time. [chuckles]
-This is where I picked him up, here. -[indicator clicking]
translation.it: Qui l'ho fatto salire in auto.

translation.en: No, don't fuckin' pull over. There's a camera there.
translation.it: No, non fermarti, cazzo! Là c'è una telecamera.

translation.en: There's a camera there, mate.
Just keep going.
[officer 1] This isn't about whether he did it.
It's about whether or not it's prosecutable.
And you can talk about an unsolicited confession all you like.
translation.it: Può presentare tutte le confessioni spontanee che vuole,

translation.en: This undercover operation induces a suspect to confess.
translation.it: ma questa operazione induce il sospettato a confessare

translation.en: It's inducement without evidence.
[Henry] This is where I threw his clothes.
translation.it: Qui ho gettato i suoi abiti.

translation.en: [Mark] There's nothing here.
That's good.
I strongly submit that we continue the covert operation
while the area's being searched
because if you go for an arrest without evidence
and you find nothing, he walks.
I refuse to put the victim's family through that for nothing.
translation.it: Non stresserò la famiglia della vittima per niente.

translation.en: As you're aware, the commissioner has tasked me
translation.it: Il commissario ha chiesto a me

translation.en: with making a decision as to whether or not an arrest is to take place.
translation.it: di decidere se arrestarlo o meno.

translation.en: Without evidence, he walks.
[officer 2] And that will be my decision to make.
[Henry] Just pull in up there.
[Cross] Is this it?
Yep.
[Cross] So this is where the demountable was?
-Yeah. -[Cross] So you killed him in there…
and you dragged him down where?
I don't remember that water being there.
translation.it: Non ricordo che qui ci fosse l'acqua.

translation.en: It was here though.
Here.
You sure?
Yeah, there's nothing.
[Cross] It's all right.
[officer yelling] Hold it there! Hold it there!
Stay where you are, mate! Just stay where you are!
Thank you all for your attendance.
I'll let you know at the outset that we won't be able to answer any questions.
translation.it: Vi dico da subito che non risponderemo alle domande.

translation.en: I can confirm that earlier today, an arrest was made
in relation to the disappearance of James Liston on May 12, 2002.
translation.it: in relazione al caso Liston risalente al 12 maggio 2002.

translation.en: Police are currently securing a large area in anticipation of an extensive search.
translation.it: La polizia sta isolando un'ampia zona per fare una ricerca a tappeto.

translation.en: The search area itself is located in the Queensland floodplain.
translation.it: La zona in questione è nella piana alluvionale del Queensland.

translation.en: The issue that we are facing is that flooding over the past eight years
translation.it: Il problema che abbiamo dinanzi è che le alluvioni degli ultimi otto anni

translation.en: may have removed any remaining evidence.
[John] Henry Teague.
As informed earlier,
you're here under arrest with regard to the abduction of James Liston
translation.it: è in arresto per il rapimento di James Liston

translation.en: on the 12th May, 2002.
I haven't done this, you know. Nothin' to do with me, mate.
translation.it: Non ho fatto niente. Io non c'entro nulla.

translation.en: As long as you didn't do it, there'll be no evidence
translation.it: Se è innocente e non ci sono prove,

translation.en: and you've got nothing to worry about.
translation.it: non ha nulla di cui preoccuparsi.

translation.en: Now, you got a minute. Anything you need?
translation.it: Le è concesso un minuto. Vuole qualcosa?

translation.en: Anyone got a smoke?
[Rylett] We'll be undertaking a basic search of the forest covering.
translation.it: Effettueremo una ricerca di base nel bosco.

translation.en: We have around four acres to manage.
translation.it: Parliamo di circa un ettaro e mezzo.

translation.en: Additional Forensics are searching the demountable
which was relocated when the site sold
translation.it: spostato quando il sito fu venduto

translation.en: and where it's alleged that the victim was killed.
translation.it: e dove pare sia stata uccisa la vittima.

translation.en: Don't disturb potential evidence.
If you come across anything, pause and raise your hand.
translation.it: Se trovate qualcosa, fermatevi e alzate la mano.

translation.en: -[Cross] How we looking? -[forensic coordinator] Found nothing.
-Nothing at all? -No.
The divers have finished with the lake, but no, nothing.
translation.it: I sub hanno controllato il lago, ma niente.

translation.en: [Mark] No, hold on.
It's night.
I'm in my house.
My son is asleep in his room.
translation.it: Mio figlio dorme in camera sua.

translation.en: And I hear a voice.
It's coming from downstairs.
I walk toward it.
I can barely breathe.
It's not a person talking.
translation.it: Non è una persona a parlare.

translation.en: It's a tape recorder.
I press the button to turn it off.
But when I turn it off…
the voice keeps coming…
…keeps talking.
